data.prayer: Father, let those from the 12,126 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vichada, Colombia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 12,126 believers in Vichada to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Vichada against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Vichada do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Siripu people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Vichada, Colombia know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 12,126 believers in Vichada against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.section_summary:
the state of Vichada, Colombia has a population of 113,000.

We estimate Vichada has 12,126 people who might know Jesus, 93,611 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 7,263 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Vichada, Colombia will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.
